text: The People's Revolutionary Party of Kangleipak (PREPAK) is an armed insurgent group in Manipur demanding a separate and independent homeland. PREPAK was formed under the leadership of R. K. Tulachandra on October 9, 1977. ==References== Category:Separatist movements of India Category:Organizations based in Manipur Category:1977 establishments in Asia Category:Rebel militia groups in Asia Category:1970s establishments in India
title: People's Revolutionary Party of Kangleipak
